EmailTemplate.name: LI Copy of License
EmailTemplate.subject: Copy of License
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear License Holder,
Thank you for your inquiry. A copy of the requested license is attached. We are pleased to announce that you may now obtain a new license or renew an existing license on-line.
Please see the attached brochure for details on creating an on-line account. Thank you for your investment in the City of Philadelphia.
Sincerely, Customer Care Staff Department of L & I
